summary: 1954  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1954  was a common year starting on Friday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1954th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 954th year of the 2nd millennium, the 54th year of the 20th century, and the 5th year of the 1950s decade.
